statements: UPDATE solo_travel_visa_requirements SET visa_requirements = 'Entry visa required' WHERE country_name = 'France';
UPDATE solo_travel_visa_requirements SET entry_regulations = 'Apply for visa at least 3 months in advance' WHERE country_name = 'United States';
UPDATE solo_travel_visa_requirements SET visa_requirements = 'Tourist visa required', entry_regulations = 'Valid passport, return ticket required' WHERE country_name = 'France';
UPDATE solo_travel_visa_requirements SET entry_regulations = 'Visa on arrival', visa_requirements = 'E-visa available for tourists' WHERE country_name = 'Australia';
UPDATE solo_travel_visa_requirements SET visa_requirements = 'Valid passport required' WHERE country = 'Japan';
UPDATE entry_regulations SET entry_conditions = 'Negative PCR test required' WHERE country = 'United States';
UPDATE solo_travel_visa_requirements SET visa_requirements = 'Passport valid for at least 6 months, Proof of accommodation, Round-trip flight itinerary' WHERE country = 'Italy';
UPDATE entry_regulations SET entry_conditions = 'Negative COVID-19 test result within 72 hours, Mandatory 14-day quarantine upon arrival' WHERE country = 'Australia';
UPDATE solo_travel_visa_requirements SET duration = '30 days' WHERE country = 'France';
UPDATE visa_applications SET application_status = 'Approved' WHERE country = 'Germany';
UPDATE solo_travel_visa_requirements SET visa_required = true, duration = '30 days' WHERE country = 'France';
UPDATE visa_applications SET application_status = 'Approved' WHERE application_id = 12345;
UPDATE SoloTravelVisaRequirements SET visa_required = TRUE, visa_type = 'Tourist Visa' WHERE country_code = 'US';
UPDATE CountryEntryRegulations SET entry_restrictions = 'Travel Ban for Non-Essential Travelers' WHERE country_code = 'CA';
UPDATE SoloTravelVisaRequirements SET visa_required = TRUE, visa_duration = 30 WHERE country_code = 'US';
UPDATE VisaIssuanceHistory SET issue_date = '2022-06-30', issued_by = 'Embassy of XYZ' WHERE visa_type = 'Tourist Visa';
UPDATE visa_requirements SET entry_requirements = 'Valid passport and visa application form' WHERE country_name = 'USA';
UPDATE visa_fee SET fee_amount = 150.00, fee_currency = 'USD' WHERE country_name = 'Germany' AND visa_type = 'Tourist Visa';
UPDATE visa_requirements SET visa_validity = '30 days' WHERE country_name = 'Thailand';
UPDATE visa_fee SET fee_amount = 1000.50, fee_currency = 'USD' WHERE country_name = 'United States' AND visa_type = 'Tourist';
